item.title: श्रृङ्गारतिलकम्
item.description:
[[श्रृङ्गारतिलकम् Source: EB]]

[

[TABLE]

[TABLE]

[TABLE]

Amongst the Indian rhetoricians Rudraṭa occupies a prominent place both by his age and the value of his works. Of these two are known, the Kâvyâlaṁkâraand the Çṛṅgâratilaka, and as all the quotations from Rudraṭa I have come upon, with few exceptions probably due to an inadvertence of the writers, are actually found in either of these two, Rudraṭa perhaps did not compose any other work.
